content.detailedDescription:
Hello friend i am an abuctee here is one of my abductions
it must have been about a year ago not sure date, 2010 ] but i went to the city to visit my brother. around 2 am i left his house and walked to a longtime friend who also lived in the city. it is only about 10 min walk. when walking the next thing i can remember was having my eyes closed and hearing this calm, relaxing, soothing almost hypnotizing in a females voice saying. kevin,, kevin,,, its ok kevin where here to help, it's ok, where no going to harm you, its okay. we������re going to make you feel better. then my eyes opened up and at first there was a blinding light but then it went away and i could see the room and in the room were 2 grey aliens very tall i remember the room there was 2 different colors in the room 1 on the top of the wall and on at the bottom almost like a trim around a room the top color was purple and the bottom color was blue, it was a thin line of theses colors trimming the room as light, light was coming from them. i asked the alien if they aren������t going to harm me what they are going to do to me. they replied back ������we are going to help you and fix you������ i know my mouth wasn������t moving when talking to them. because when i would get scared then i could tell i was using my mouth. the next thing i remember was each grey on each side of me they then put me up against a cold metal thing and it was moving with each of them on my sides they brought me to a hall to the left of the white room, the hall was dark cloudy or misty like fog, the hall ways must have been 50 ft. 40 ft., long it took about 30 to 50 to get me down hall i can remember that, so about maybe 40 ft. 50 ft., before i got to the next room i could see to the right in the room a huddled circle formation of at least 7 to 8 greys in a huddled formation they were tall. there was and exit to another room next to them with a hall way same as the white room. to the left in the room was a smaller group about 5. the room itself was dark round there was a fog or a mist in the room but at time it seemed to go away, also a dim light because i could see across the room. the walls of the room were indented almost like a v shape indent in the wall or this } so the walls were not flat like are������s. when entering the room i could smell a chemical like smell something like bleach or peroxide or ammonia. they brought me into center of the room. i remember one of them was so tall he had to like bend a little to look me in the eyes. what������s weird at this point was i wasn������t really scared and it seemed hard for me to see their face at times others i could see them .I was still standing up against that thing they put me against in the white room. then, one of them out there hand on my nose and another one put this small black tube up my nose, it made this noise, the alien greyshad long fingers very tall had a little mouth that moved up n down motion like a fish mouth but nothing was coming out. i remember screaming after they did that. all the time i could hear the voice saying it������s going to be ok we hear to help, in a soft calm voice as if they was trying to relax me, but i was scared the next thing i remember was the thing i was standing up against slammed down making this loud noise it slammed down like a table, so i was now lying down they then brought me towards the left side of the room so it seemed. i began to get hostile and remember cocking my left leg back and kicking the alien to my lower left, he went against wall n fell down. i clearly remember doing it and watching the grey fly against the wall and sliding down the other greys quickly backed off; from then on the next thing i remember was on the side of the road again. right after i realized what had happened still dazed n confused, tired, lost feeling. there was this cop who drove real slow right next to me and i asked him where a street was and he looked at me for a few minutes, he didn������t say a word just pointed and stared with this nasty look, blank see threw me look almost, i had lost 3 or 4 hours of time it was nearly 6 in morning when i got to my friend������s house. 


������ i remember the smells in the craft; they were like bleach, ammonia, or peroxide smell, the greys were at least 7 ft. or 8ft tall, long fingers, slips for mouths n smaller black eyes

������ i was talking to them telepathic

������ i use to have a crooked nose but since the alien stuck that small black tube up my nose it������s straight again

������ i remember the colors of inside the craft white, purple, blue, 

������ i remember some of there tech, such as a thin about 7inch black tube, the thing i was standing against moves on its own and is capable at fast speed slamming down like a table or bed.
there are other accounts but this one stick outs in my head the most... please i need help in this matter ever since it has happened it has consumed my thinking completely and is all i can think about, it took me almost a year to go outside at night i was so petrified. since every night before i go to bed i just have to stair or forced to look up in the sky at nothing my eyes wide open with tears pouring down my face and my jaw wide open, i������ll be standing like that for at least 10 min if not longer. almost in a drown fashion. i am desperately looking for help and do not know where to look i am branching out to you in hopes you may be able to point me in right way in helping me on this matter i thank you very much for reading my email and you time thank you again.
kevin
content.summary: I was abducted a few time, this abduction is the most clearest

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were loading our purchases into my vehicle in the parking lot of the willmar wal-mart at approximately 3:30 in the afternoon on wednesday, august 24th, 2011.  she spotted the object first and asked me what it was. we observed a craft that was a shiny chrome, cigar shape cruising slowly in a straight line, traveling from the east to the west. during this time, the sky was clear blue with no clouds in the immediate area. we could see that there were no wings or other structures on the craft. the only other detail was that there were 2 black colored circles on the bottom middle of the craft. i would look at the object, look away, then look at it again to make sure it was actually what it appeared to be. i did that a couple of times. i watched it maintain a slow straight path. at first, i was awestruck at how a craft that big with no wings could cruise that slowly. there was no sound coming from the craft as you would hear from a normal aircraft. as we were watching the craft, we kept asking each other if we were seeing the exact same thing. we were. then, as we were watching it, it just simply vanished. it did not zoom off anywhere, it just disappeared. afterwards, i was rather happy that i had seen the craft because i had seen 3 other ufo's within the last 10 years. this sighting yesterday, was the closest i have ever witnessed.
content.summary: It was a bright chrome cigar shaped object cruising much slower than a normal aircraft of that size could do.

content.detailedDescription: I/we were at home. window was open and noticed the fred/blue/green/white flashing colors not moving, hovering at first then making some small circular-like movements. i called the family when i first noticed it was flashing colors and not moving. it wasn't a plane or helicopter. there are many of those around here. no fear. interesting. it finally descended slowly in the northern direction.
content.summary: Family and friends witnessed this object.

content.detailedDescription:
While i was sitting watching tv in my room my daughter was looking out my bedroom window and saw something that caught her attention.  it was an extremely clear night and the sky was sparkling with stars.  there were two objects high in the sky that were glowing white, but clearly were not stars.  i got up to see the same objects that, i observed, to turn an orange-red.  they could be described as having lights like that of an airplane, but these objects were much too high to have been an airplane and if they were a jet we would have heard the noise as we frequently hear the jets from the air force base in spokane, washington.  these two objects hovered in a parallel position for a few minutes, long enough for me to also call my son in to look, as well.  he also observed the objects, but as he was watching them, the one to the left quickly took off to the north and literally disappeared in an instant.  my daughter stated that the other object shot off towards the west, back up over our house and out of view.  when we went to the front of the house there was nothing to be seen in the sky.

in checking the internet we found that there have been several sightings in the north idaho area and nearby washington, spaced about a month apart.  most seemed to take place sometime between 9 and 10 pm.  also there were repeated sightings of the orange-red objects sometimes in a formation of five that head off towards the west. 

coincidentally, we have an air force base to the west and a small naval facility to the north that they use for nuclear submarine research and testing.

we were all pretty excited about the prospects of what we were seeing, but the kids also were a little scared that whoever was in them might have known we were watching them or that someone from the government would find out and lock us up?!  of course, i hope none of this is a real worry.
content.summary: Two unknown objects observed in north idaho sky.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to roll up the windows to my truck because i noticed lightning to the east.As i was looking to the east i noticed dancing lights north of the thundercloud.I called my family to confirm what i was seeing and sure enough they all saw the dancing lights.These lights for a fact are not planes because ive never seen planes move like that, considering we live by an airforce base.The objects were moving all over the place....Down, up, stopping, u-turning, diagonally, swirling, darting back and forth.They even seem to chase each other. i noticed around 10:30 and we still havent lost sight of them. i also called my cousin and friend who live in a different area of town and sure enough they saw them too! my cousin was surprised so he took off to a nearby lake, to see if he can see them better without city lights. also a neighbor caught a suspicious triangle on his cell phone.Still trying to figure out how to download video to computer. thanks.
content.summary: Dancing lights in front of lightning/thunder storm.

content.detailedDescription: Ok  mufonn this  is  (name removed to fi report panel) cms 08/25/11 08:00 cst flg  again  and  these  are  the  same  events  happening  2  nights  in  a row  the  ojects  hve  shifted  therew  placement  in  the  sky  slightly  but  are still  doing  exact  saame  show  as  last night  this  is  amazing the  only  difference  is  one object  seems  to  saty orange   while  the  other  distant  craft  seem  to  bee flickering  or  strobing  different  colors
content.summary: Multi  objects  in  sky   giving  off star like  light and  having  eradic  flight  paterns  while  staying  in  same  general  spot  in the  sky

content.detailedDescription: viewed by my wife while on pool deck looking towards west. her best description was a glowstix green in color but perpendicular to ground. flew south to north. was prpb over gulf of mexico.Lost sight behind a tree. no. sound. could not tellhow big it was. saw plane few. minutes late but nothimg else
content.summary: Look like glowstix flying south to north. west of my house

content.detailedDescription:
I typed this summary as a more detailed explanation than the original. also important to note, more has happened since i first reported incident.

ufo sighting 8/23/11 on august 23, 2011 at approximately 22:00 hours i stepped outside to have a cigarette. as i gazed at the sky i noticed a strange bright light, brighter than a star in the south southwest sky just under and to the left of the big dipper. it seemed as if it may have been 10 to 20 miles away. it had multicolored lights moving around the bright light horizontally while the bright white light was pulsating in a rhythmic fashion. the multicolored lights changed color almost as if the colors were smoothly changing from color to color like a prism or color wheel. this immediately got my attention. i continued to watch for 15 minutes and noticed that it did not move, at least not that i could perceive. i then went and got my wife whom saw it herself and made me aware that there were 2 additional lights pulsating in unison with the initial anomaly. the other 2 lights were smaller and only white with no other colors like the initial anomaly. all three formed a triangle. the other 2 were only visible for 10 ��� 15 minutes. we video'd what we saw but because of the lighting on the ground it seems as if we didnt get anything. when my wife and i confirmed at 22:30 hrs that it had not moved i called my friend who lives 20 miles away and in the direction of the object. while on the phone with my friend, i described the area of the sky it was in and he was able to locate it. we were very excited as this is a topic we are interested in and have been sky watchers for some time. the points that compelled our belief that it was a ufo were as follows: 1. they did not move. 2. no conventional aircraft has lights that are blue, green, red, yellow, etc. & 3. it seemed way too high of an altitude to be a helicopter. i then went inside the house and ended the phone call with an understanding that he would continue to watch it and call me if he saw any changes. at about 23:30 i took the dog out and noticed it was gone. i scanned the sky and noticed it was now resting in another area of the sky. if it were originally at 7 o���clock it was now at 11 o���clock and not moving. i observed for 10 ��� 15 minutes. this is where it gets strange. i consciously focused on the object and asked a series of questions in my mind. ���what are you?���, ���what are your intentions?���, ���where did you come from?���, ���i want to know���. immediately, my son came running out the front door in a panic. he told me when he came down stairs for a drink he saw a white hooded figure out of the corner of his eye. he said it looked like a white towel floating in the air and it moved. he said when he turned to look at it, it vanished. he was visibly shaken. i listened to his description then comforted him and tucked him in bed. bear in mind my wife was sleeping at this point. i played around on the internet and went to bed at about 1 am. the next morning my wife tells me she came downstairs in the middle of the night and saw a hooded white figure with no face in the same spot in the office as my son had seen. they had not spoken of this to each other. the difference was that she saw it facing her with just a black area where a face should be. she was visibly shaken and had goose bumps as she recounted her experience. she said that although it was very real and bizarre, she felt at peace and it did not scare her. we did not talk about this around our son as he is too young for these things. the possibility of one of them contaminating the other���s memory was very small as i made every attempt to control my personal investigation of the white figure. i had them go into separate rooms and draw what they had seen. they drew very similar pictures. the figure had human shape and only visible from the waist area up. it stood approximately 6��� tall. it moved when my son saw it. it seemingly looked at my wife. obviously this incident shook us up a bit. i don���t know what the significance of it is is but i do know they are related. we have never, in 7 years in this house, seen anything out of the ordinary. we are sane people. we are confused.
content.summary: Multiple ufo sighting with possible contact updated

content.detailedDescription: It was around 11pm at night and i was just looking at all the stars in the sky while sitting in my backyard. as soon as this formation of lights came into my view i stood up because something seemed strange about the lights. i noticed these lights that were in a triangular formation with a smaller green light in the front and two very bold yellow lights in the back. i couldn't see an object behind these lights at all and it made no noise that i could hear of. the the strangest thing was that only the back right yellow light seemed to be pulsating. it wasn't flashing like you see on your typical airplane but it was pulsating. it was moving in a straight line moving from west to east coming from the usa side of the st.Lawrence river. it continued to move in this path until it was just a single point of light in the sky then it was out of my view because it had moved behind my neighbors house so i couldn't see it anymore. i couldn't judge the actual speed of it but considering how low it was it seemed to be moving a a fairly fast speed
content.summary: Lights in trianglular formation

content.detailedDescription:
I was panning the skies with an infrared camcorder when this solid looking, out of the orinary object came into view. i managed to get around 10 minutes of footage before running out of data space.

it was obviously quite a long way away, but it just seemed to hang there.

darren ashmore

http://infrared-aerial-phenomena-research.Blogspot.Com/

http://www.Youtube.Com/user/daboxash
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Cone shaped ufo captured on ir camera

content.detailedDescription:
My now ex-wife and i were parked in the parking lot of the old triple s motel (now gone) on the beach at atlantic beach, nc.  it was a sunday afternoon, very cold, but sunny.  there was no one on the beach, and the parking lot was empty except for us. we were facing south. the triple s fishing pier (now gone) was to the east of us about 50 meters.  nobody was on the pier; i think it was closed for the season.  the sea was very calm, with only a slight ripple on the surface and about a six-inch lop of wave at about 4-5 minute intervals on the beach.  

off to my right (west) at a distance of about 1/2 to 3/4 mile, i noticed a large dark spot under the surface of the ocean.  i did not pay a lot of attention to it at first; my wife and i were just enjoying the afternoon and talking about family things.  

the object was about 500 meters offshore, moving in toward the pier very slowly, at an angle.  at first i thought it might be a school of menhaden, but it appeared to move in a straight line.  it also maintained its shape, which was sort of an oval, big at the front and tapering to a very narrow tail.  i called it to the attention of my wife, and she remarked that it did not seem to change shape the way a school of fish would.

the object kept moving in from offshore at what i judge to be about a 30-degree angle, moving in from the southwest.  when i first saw it, i estimate the water depth where it was, was approximately 35-40 feet.  it kept moving in until it was almost directly in front of us, in approximately 25 feet of water, and about 50 meters west of the pier.  then it stopped.  

during the time we had been observing it (about 20 minutes) the object had not changed shape and had moved in straight lines like it was being steered.  it did not undulate or change direction the way a school of fish will do.  when it stopped, it did not change shape.  

after a few minutes it turned to its left (toward the beach) and then back to the right, then back to the left, like it was scanning the bottom.  it then moved forward, in toward the beach on the same course as before, stopped, backed up a bit, and turned to where it was facing almost due east.  at this point it was facing the main part of the pier but was inshore of the seaward end of the pier.  at no time during all these maneuvers did my wife or i see any disturbance on the surface of the water, a fact on which we both remarked at the time.

the object paused where it was for a few minutes, then "sniffed" its way around to where it was pointed approximately southeast, and began moving forward.  it accelerated from dead stop to what i judge to be about 35-40 miles per hour in roughly 4 seconds, and then (for lack of a better definition) appeared to hit warp speed.  it simply shot out of sight.  at no time did my wife or i observe any disturbance on the surface of the water.

a few months later i related these events to my father, who was a retired rear admiral in the us navy, and asked him if he could "check it out" with his navy contacts.  several months after that, i asked him if he had found anything out about it.  his response was, "that is something you don't want to ask any more questions about.  ever."  and that was the last we ever spoke of it.  my dad died in 1999.
content.summary: This was a uso.

content.detailedDescription: This wosdfkkjasf  sfasjdfjjs is a test case. please disregard.
content.summary: Test case #9

content.detailedDescription:
It was aug.2nd,1957, my 18th birthday and my brother, cousin and i were celebrating it, by doing what we love. fishing.
we were about 45-50 miles from idaho falls,id. and we had planned to camp  and fish all week.
in the early morning of august 2nd, i was awakened by my brother. he was shaking me and telling me to come outside. there was something i had to see. my brother was the type of person who very seldom got excited, so i knew it had to be something of importance. as i exited the tent, my brother was pointing across the small bay we were camped on.There, across the bay, was the strangest object that i had ever seen.

the bay we were camped on was about 50 yards wide and app. thirty yards beyond that was a fuzzy, silvery, object, hovering about five feet above the ground. it appeared to be completely stationary, except for a slight wobble from side to side. about ten feet in in front of the object, on the ground, was what appeared to be a much smaller object which gave me the impression that it was moving, though i really don't remember seeing it move.
 i wanted to get my binoculars and get a better look and they were in the truck. i slowly made my way to the truck, hoping to get a better look.As i opened the door of the truck the dome light came on, and the object across the bay, suddenly "turned off." and then became very bright, and started moving slowly in our direction. my cousin had joined us, though i don't remember when. 
as the object slowly "drifted" towards us, i crawled under the truck. my brother and cousin dashed for the truck and the three of us crawled underneath it. although it was partially obscured, because we were under the truck, we could see the object coming our way.I remember glancing in the direction i first saw the object and the smaller object was no longer there. i was never so scared in my life. in about 2 minutes or so, the object passed directly overhead. i could feel it more than see it, because it didn't cast a reflection of light; i could feel the hair on my head and arms start to tingle, and then stand straight up, but i thought it was because i really was that scared. as soon as it passed over the truck the object went straight up and in about ten seconds or less it was gone.
my brother and cousin later told me, they felt the same sensations as i.
we decided to cut our camping trip short and head for home.We haphazardly broke camp and headed for home. 
we told no-one about that night, how do you tell someone, specially when you're a teen-ager, that you were so scared that you wet your pants? so, we told no-one. my brother and cousin are both gone now,my brother killed in an auto accident and my cousin committed suicide and i am 72 and the last living witness.
from what i have been told by more than 1 person, that is a very active area for ufo's 
this area, though not far from civilization, is very secluded and the nearest house is about 20 miles away. it's a wild area, but accessible by dirt road.
content.summary: Object was fuzzy, bright , (glowing?) and silent

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside my patio as i usually do and gazing up into the stars. i see many planes pass by every night although last night was a different story. as one small white star like object caught my eye, i followed it in what i thought was going to be a typical straight path into the distance.. it turned. i stood up in a cold sweat as i noticed it had 3 "friends". i put it like this because these 4 objects were.. playing. i watched at what appeared to be over a mile away from me as these star like objects zipped through the sky at very high speeds. there were no clouds in the sky for some sort of laser to be reflecting on to it and these things roamed so far as to go directly above my home. i nearly went straight through my glass sliding door trying to get my video camera. i taped these events for around 2 hours, as they would not let up. the footage is so dark you can't even see anything. at exactly 11:50, opposite the events i was watching, the brightest meteor i have ever seen illuminated then fizzled out in to sparks. that put the shakes on me. i don't how i removed my self from the patio, but something inside of me told me to get inside. as i was picking up my scattered camera equipment at 12:30, the strange lights were still there roaming the sky. some one please tell me these were birds in the moon light or something. i have been studying and looking at ufo footage for years and i have never seen objects move like this before in my life. they darted so fast that they seemed to blur, it was very strange.  this sighting was over montgomery county in texas. if i enhance this video to see what i was seeing, mufon will be the first to know.
content.summary: The stars were moving

content.detailedDescription:
It was between 10:30pm-11:00pm august 23rd. this was viewed from the east side of the city. i was inside taking care of a few chores before bed and my boyfriend was outside having a smoke. suddenly i hear him yelling for me to run outside. he points to the sky and asks, "what is that?" and together we look up. there is a light, about the same size/brightness/color as the surrounding stars, moving very slowly. i brushed it off as an airplane, albeit a very strange looking one. it was almost over head, a little south, and moving eastward. it was moving in a straight line but then got a little shaky and sporadic, although still running a straight course. he runs out to the street to try and get a better look and he lost view of it in the process. i watched the entire time and suddenly the light started to shrink, it changed color to a darker orange, and then blinked out to nothing. in the same area appeared 4 more star-like things, the same darker orange as the original light had turned before it blinked out. they didn't move. they simple blinked on in a diamond shape, lasted about 5 seconds, then blinked out. the last 4 lights were very, very faint. he didn't catch those, only i did.

the whole thing happened so quickly i didn't even have time to think about grabbing a camera to record what was happening. it was the first time i've witnessed anything of the sort.
content.summary: Star-like object blinks out to nothing over saskatoon

content.detailedDescription:
This account is a compilation of my experience and my 9 year old son's experience.

i am an educated adult woman who has an open mind about the world around me with a heavy dose of skepticism.

it was 9:30 at night, aug 23, 2011, my son and i were reading books in my bedroom.  my husband left to take our dog for a walk.  he returned after a couple of minutes stating that he had just witnessed a ufo.  knowing my husband, i knew he meant that he saw something he couldn't explain.  i listened to his account and then told him to go back outside with my son and see if they would see it again.  i joined them after a couple of minutes on our back deck.  my husband pointed out over toward the power lines in the field behind our house saying that was where he saw the lights.
i stood with them for just a minute watching the sky when i saw a light appear.  it was white then turned into a bright green light.  it was stationary and had just "switched on" in the sky.  i asked my husband, "is that it?".  "yes", he said and as he said that, the light went out and reappeared to the left of where it had been.  it disappeared again, reappearing four more times in a clockwise arc pattern in the night sky.  
as i watched it appear, disappear (always a bright green light), i tried to make sense of what i was seeing.  it behaved like a rc airplane as it arced and darted.  the color of the light looked like a laser color, but i couldn't see any clouds or smoke that would show a laser.  i saw stars in the sky.
my son said he saw it darting back and forth and he could see small bits of electricity shooting from behind it.  its "movement" was only assumed because the light would turn off and reappear somewhere else again and again in a darting pattern.  at one point it looked as if the light stretched out, again like a laser lighting a wire (my mind was thinking one of the power lines was being illuminated by a laser light).  the whole experience lasted only 20 seconds or so.  we didn't hear any sound.  no engines or motors, no people out in the field.
i then got my phone and started to record.  even though the video is dark and nothing was seen after that, our first recount and discussion of what we saw was captured on the video. 
my husband's account has been submitted independently on this site.
content.summary: Light moving rapidly across night sky

content.detailedDescription: Was taking video from my living room 3rd floor window that faces east of strange cloud that was whiter and very low over river (the tree tops are only as tall as the building) and hoping to get lighting strikes, there was a storm at the time. when i reveiwed video i noticed this light appear forming into golden orb as its rising, dropping then disappearing in the lower left corner, reappearing again on left side and i also notice what seems to be 1 on left side of street light. i thought it was reflextion but noticed at one point it moves away from light a short distance. there seems to be alot of activity during cloudy and stormy days in this area so i have a few other pictures.
content.summary: Taking video of strange cloud over river during storm

content.detailedDescription:
I recently seen something on the history channel and the discription of a ufo 
that was given was identical to one i witnessed back in o7 or 08 not quite sure. it was between 8 or 9 and dark already. i was going out to turn the water off in the garden and close the shed door. i just looked up there it was. it came from the n-e (the direction of our local airport) and continued on to the s-w. once it was right over head you could tell the thing was f^%#@*g massive. i guess like holding a opened up newspaper at arms lenghth while looking up. it was big!!! the triangle had 5 red lights and then there was a single red light following like flying wing. this one had no body or nothing just a red light.I ran to the patio to get my grandfather "papa papa come check this out" he walked out with me looked up and said "yep" then went back in. i laughed my ass off. it moved around the same speed as a blimp. no sound at all until it was a ways off then just a low hum. i never reported it just told friends. if i was to call the police here there so narrow minded to them it would be gang related. lol. any way thats  it. it was visable round 5 mins or so then it got out of my sight due to trees and houses. i would like to to know were there any reportings of this around the dates of my sighting? i would be interested to know if any one else seen it too.
content.summary: Large triangle w/ 5 red lights and single red light following

content.detailedDescription: On aug 23rd evening 10:17 pm i was walking to the corner store.I like to look up at the stars all the time. i figure that, not alot of people ever do.Anyways, i looked to the nw direction ,the sky was partly cloudy and a slight cool breeze the temp was about 70 degrees. i thought the craft that i'd seen was a huge plane at first, but it had no sound what so ever and the city lights you could see that it had a non shiny surface the strange thing is..It looked like a square not a box, but a messuring construction square. the lights looked so way wierd like the size basket balls 500 ft in the sky, and had another outter ring around the lights slowly getting brighter then slowly getting dim. i stopped to look at it to see if it was going to move in some other direction but didn't. it stayed on a nw direction..Like it was flying towards castle afb. which is a federal prison now..About 3 minutes later..I think these jets came from lemoore naval air station, because they were 2 qf-a18's hornets / the nationl guard base near me..Nothing was flying out of their..And the only planes that they have are qf-16's and these jets were hot on it's tail..I waited near the store for over 15 minutes to see if maybe the craft would come back..But never did...
content.summary: Walking to the corner store. looked up and had seen strange object in night time sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was headed home on 70 east, and i saw wat looked like a shooting star. as i continued driving the light never faded out, like a shooting star would do. i lost sight of it for a minute, because of a treeline, but after the clearing- the one light i first saw had separated into 5 separate lights(orbs). when i first saw it i thought it was a shooting star, but it didn't burn out like one. then i told my fiance that it was a ufo, she told me i was tripping and that it was so aircraft performing from the aircraft show that was here. i said not this late at night. bottomline, i was surprised to witness a event like this in kansas city. i saw a sighting in arizona, that was similiar but it was five lights that were in a diagonal line and they just hovered and then disappeared.
content.summary: It looked like a shooting star, and separated into 5 separate orbs

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside with my nikon d-60 10 megapixel digital slr camera just taking pictures of whatever might make a good picture, lizards etc... anyways. i noticed a blackhawk helicopter flying overhead and took 5 pictures of it as it passed over. this was back in the spring. around may i'm guessing maybe early june. well yesterday i transfered the pictures from the memory card to the computer, and as i was looking through them i noticed a white spherical or egg shaped object that appears to be at a higher altitude than the helicopter. about the 10 o`clock position as you are looking at the photo of the helicopter. well in the next photo there is a black cigar shaped object that appears to be almost directly in front of the helicopters flightpath and at about the same altitude maybe a mile out in front of the blackhawk helicopter, but the white sphere is not in this photograph. the other pictures of the helicopter show nothing. but in these 2 pictures there is definitly something physical in the sky along with the helicopter. i did not notice them at the time i took the photos.I have attached the two photos. you be the judge. pictures have not been altered in any way. not enlarged, cropped. zoom in on the objects in the pictures... its grainy when zoomed all the way in but it will give you a better view and shapes of the objects. 

i would like to add that approximaty within 2 weeks before or after this event i was standing in just about the exact same spot gazing at the sky and noticed a greyish/white sphere, then another, then another.... once my eyes were trained on that position of the sky i started noticing a lot of these objects. probably at least 10 and they were all flying in a westerly direction in a very loose formation at very high altitude,all of them had about the same flight path. a few of the objects were "wandering" within the formation though and i saw sunlight reflecting off of a couple of them, but it wasnt a bright glint, was more of a dull greyish reflection. i tried getting pics of those but i couldnt get the camera to autofocus on them and by the time i switched it to manual and pointed the camera skyward they were gone. i'm beginning to think that our skies are filled with things like this but they are very hard to notice if you arent looking directly at them. anyways thats it....
content.summary: Ufo's in photographs of blackhawk helicopter

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my garden as usual, it was around 10:00pm tuesday august 23rd 2011, i always watch the skies and take photographs of cloud formations.
i saw a bright white light about 20-30 feet above a neighbour���������s house. i first thought it was a plane, but it was silent and moving slowly towards my garden. i picked up my camera (nokia p100) and tried to take photos and video, but the camera isn't brilliant at night. i managed to take a few photos and a short, poor quality video. 
the object slowly and silently went above my garden towards my next door neighbour���������s rooftop it hovered occasionally and i managed to get a few stable photos, it seemed to be changing colour to orange. 
after a while the object disappeared behind my next door neighbour���������s rooftop.
i felt great; i have seen a ufo in the late 70's early 80's and i have always watched the skies for others since then.

the second object appeared roughly the same place as the first around 10:15pm on the same night, but at first this one was orange coloured. i took two photos and a video which lasts about 1 min 10 seconds. the photos are shaky as is the video, but you can get a rough idea of what the object looks like. to me it seemed as though it was pulsating bright orange colour and later it seemed to flash from orange to green and orange again.
the object went over my neighbour���������s gardens "maybe" 500-600 feet high and eventually got too distant to see any more.  

i have submitted photographs and videos; the sound on the videos is my garden water feature.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two objects appeared seperately in the sky over my garden and neighberhood.

content.detailedDescription: I was  taking my  trash out and  north  north east  maybe  5 to  10  miles  maybe less i noticeed  what appeared at first to be a star well i  then  noticed  while  gazing  at  it  it  dropped  from its  original position  i  immediately  screamed  for my mothe  and  she  also  witnessed the  single  object was  changing  positions in  the  sky  i  proceeded  to  watch  this  object for over  30  minutes  its  probably  still out  there as  im  writing  this but  no  doubt  its  a genuine  sighting.I  also  noticed  that  kind of  in  a formation  pattern  of  a triangle  theres  2 more  objects  which  i observed  having  the  same  characteristics  as the  first  blinking  jerking back and  fourth quickly and  flashing  a multitude  of  brilliant  colors iv  seen  small ufos  before  but  never  for this  long  a time  period  i  estimate  thes  objects  to be   just  over the  eufaula  alabama area  from  where im  located maybe  a little  east  of  ther   but im  not  certain  feel  free to  contact me  if  you  like   i will be  seeing  these  objects  again  i hope  and  will report  any  further  acticvity to  this  site   thanks   jb
content.summary: Bright   star like  object that caught  eye because  if flshed around 8 dif colors rapidly

content.detailedDescription:
My mom, younger brother, and i were driving east on battle ground highway around 9:20 pm pacific standard time on august 23, 2011 to take my brother to his friend's house. i was sitting in the front passenger seat, my mom was driving, and my brother was sitting in the back, directly behind me.

as we were driving he asked if there were always three stars "over there," as he pointed south into the trees. my mom and i ignored him and told him he was probably just seeing parts of the big dipper. then suddenly he said, "there it is again!" shortly followed by, "now the trees are in the way!" i turned to look and see what he was freaking out about and just seconds later we passed a break in the trees and there were four bright, circular lights almost in the formation of a boomerang. they were just hovering above the trees. the lights were almost a white-yellow color. nothing like the lights on your typical airplane, they were much brighter and a different color. my mom told us they were probably just jets or helicopters, so she rolled down the windows, but we heard nothing but the wind.

as quickly as we saw the lights, the trees were in the way again. my brother and i convinced my mom to turn left at the light near o' brady's in dollars corner, so maybe we could get a glimpse of the lights again. when we turned, there were only two lights visible. then just seconds later there was only one. when we turned back to head east again, my brother and i watched out the back window only to see the last light completely vanish. when the lights disappeared, we couldn't see anything visibly leaving, the lights were just simply gone.

when my mom and i were driving home, heading west on battle ground highway, i kept my eye on the trees the whole time to make sure we hadn't just seen some sort of street lights or something, but there was no sign of the lights.
content.summary: Four bright, circular lights in formation of boomerang seen hoovering just above the trees, then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I'm reposting my report because i usually see my pictures/proof on alot of diffrent web-sites pretaining to ufo's...And i've sent in some great pictyres on my last 2 reports and haven't seen much on the web...So thats my resoning...I first saw this same exact ufo on april 12th,2011...Well tonight august 23rd,2011 it has shown up again??? it is very large it has 3 red rectangular lights...It is one of my best pictures i have captured to date..I think these web cams have infared capability, it's the only way to explain these images i capture... everyone thinks & tells me they are planes and helicopters...I really dont think so. i also caught a large cylinder shaped ufo..Its very big..& bright...And some strange objects on the east river..Look at my pictures, they are real !!! i wish someone would just look into this already...Hey bill birnes call me...Lol !!! thank you all...Signed ~marko333~the alien king~
content.summary: Ufo's over brooklyn, ny again !!!

content.detailedDescription: On august 23, 2011 at 9:30 pm cst, i was driving south on hwy 6, between shields, nd junction & selfridge, nd, when a bright flash illuminated the sky & surrounding area.  i immediately thought it was lightning then immediately noticed there were no clouds in sky.  looking east in the direction from where the light came & as the flash/lights were dimming, i could see three stationary lights/spheres aligned side by side which vanished immediately.  i woke my passenger but the light was gone already.  i told her what i saw, then pulled to the side of the road & we scanned the sky immediately but could not see anything related to the incident.  we are located in a rural area & i have never seen anything like this in the 30+ years i have lived in the area.  i would compare it to an old time flash bulb camera or like someone/something was taking a picture & needed the area illuminated, but on a much larger scale.  ellsworth air force base is about 230 miles to the southwest & minot air force base is located about 165 miles to the northwest.  i have seen military aircraft flying in our area on occasion however i am not aware of any type of machine that is capable of producing the light i saw & disappearing just as quickly.
content.summary: Bright flash that lit up area then dimmed immediately.  three side by side spheres were visible then vanished

content.detailedDescription:
The weekly meeting of the local civil air patrol squadron, nd031, had just ended, and several cadets were being driven home in the squadron van, which was heading west on i-94 just west of jamestown, nd.  the object was seen by 4 of the 5 civil air patrol members in the van just east of exit 248, a bright glowing object with bright "vapor trail".  both the object and the trail were bright blue green in color.  
the object's apparent size was that of a softball, with an apparent velocity roughly equal to or slightly greater than the vehicle, which was moving at freeway speed (75 mph).  the flight path was roughtly 10 degrees descending, i.E., not quite horizontal, and appeared parallel with the interstate, east to west.  after being observed for 20-30 seconds, the object disappeared with a flash, reportedly making a couple of "popping" sounds which were audible in the vehicle while driving.  the intensity of the light was such that the inside of the van was lit, described as similar to the light of an arc welder.
the sky at the time was dark, and relatively clear with no moon and no opposing traffic to interfere with observation.
this is not a first-person account; i am compiling this account from the descriptions given by the people in the van. i am the squadron commander, but was not at the meeting; my wife, the deputy commander for cadets, was driving. based on the descriptions, i asked if this object could have been a meteor, but most felt that it looked more like a man-made object, burning with the color of magnesium on fire.  we have speculated on the possibility of a satellite reentry, but the flight angle is not conducive to that conclusion.  also, the trail apparently did not contain debris as would be expected.
reports have been made to the local sherriff's office.

thank you,

john nyberg
captain cap
content.summary: Bright glowing object slightly descending path westward parallel to i-94

content.detailedDescription:
Appeared south south west possibly over chesapeake bay or over recent virginia earthquake area.

verified through telephone with a friend 20 miles away.

my wife also saw it.

pulsating multicolored lights stationary for over 1 hour.

looked as if lights were circling around it.

at times looked as if 2 other white only lights pulsating with it all sepperated by maybe 2-3 miles.

other lights were not present very long.

went inside, came back out and it had traveled exactly parallel  nnw and stayed stationary at that point for 30 min.

tried to video but as i live in town, lights on the ground made it impossible to see with camera.
content.summary: 3 pulsating lights observed over 1.5 hr time period

content.detailedDescription: No time to do this tonight...
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple ufo's -one landed and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
At approx 9:20 at night, i went out my back door on the deck to walk my dog when i saw a green flashing object in front of the constellation cassiopeia about 30 degrees up in the sky.  initially, i thought it might be the green light of an airplane wing but immediately realized that it was very different than that.  it was not a point source of light like a bulb but rather a rectangular sheet of bright green color light that appeared to shift or flicker in patterns across the object from left to right.  there was no blinking--the light was bright and constant (though a changing pattern).  the object moved quickly to one side (maybe 2 degrees) and back and forth and then disappeared.  about 20 seconds later, it reappeared and then starting moving across a larger arc in the sky (maybe 5 degrees) faster than any aircraft could.  the green light moved the other direction across the object (almost a short ribbon shape) and then it disappeared.

the anomaly was obviously not a plane (they can't move this fast) and the green color was brighter than the green used by planes.  it wasn't a meteor shower because the light was in the shape of a wide rectangular shape.  there was no moon and the sky was completely cloudless.  the object was not fireworks nor did it appear to be laser light reflected on some surface.

i ran upstairs and told my wife and son so we all went back onto the deck and moments later, the light/object appeared again (all three of us saw it).  this time, it moved extremely fast about 10 degrees from right to left (again with a pattern flowing across it), disappeared for a split second, and then reappeared heading fast in the other direction so one could "fill in the blanks" to see that it had just turned in a tight counterclockwise arc.  the object disappeared for about 10 seconds and then reappeared much farther to the right above, to the right, and far beyond an electrical tower behind our house.  it was quite bright and then disappeared altogether and didn't return.  it remained at approximately the same altitude for all of the sightings.

i am a scientist and extremely skeptical person by nature.  i don't believe in aliens, deities, miracles, ghosts, or any other supernatural or other phenomena.  after much reflection, i cannot explain what this was.  this is the first and only ufo i have ever encountered.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A brilliant green object moved across the sky
